name: Alphabet Match Addetive Fun Match Three Puzzle Game For Kids
name_original: Alphabet Match Addetive Fun Match Three Puzzle Game For Kids
description:
Alphabet match game is an addictive and delicious adventure filled with colorful Fruit crunching effects and well designed puzzles! With Alphabet style Alphabet to eliminate in each level, Alphabet match is twice the fun but familiar to play

Alphabet match game is a match 3 game with colourful and Fruit, majestic combinations, and challenging game modes featuring magical potion!

Alphabet match is the most popular Alphabet pop/breaking/buster game! Another classic Alphabet match-three game. #1 Puzzle game on the world.

Fun with Alphabet game is a great way to improve your retention, memory skills like visual retention, mnemonic skills, concentration and cognitive skills!

- 298 levels with time and moves limit.
- Unlock levels in a panel where you can access at any time or continue your progress in the game.
- Game settings to turn off sound or background music

It is an exciting free time activity that will catch your eye with unbelievable beauty and unexpected new things appearing.
Destroy the target Alphabet to level up.
Play for free as you match and detonate as many Alphabet as you can.

How to play:
1. Just match three or more same identical Alphabet to score points.
2. Eliminate the more Alphabet quickly can get extra scores. Match the Alphabet until the board transparency,the Alphabet star will appear.
3. By swipe Fruit to score more and check your matching skills

Easy and fun to start but a challenge
New and improved game modes
Special boosters & powers to help you pass those tricky levels
Eye-catching graphics and colorful gameplay
Cool Sound

Enjoy with Alphabet match
